lead_paragraph: The 24th Fair of the American Institute is now open at the old place. Castle Garden, for the reception of visitors, and we predict, that it will not be beauty, usefulness and novelty of the articles on exhibition. The rush to see these, we also predict, will not be less great, nor less eager than any year before.
